title: tests: test_restart_leader_insecure failed
body:
## Bug Report
```
test pd::test_rpc_client::test_restart_leader_insecure ... thread 'pd::test_rpc_client::test_restart_leader_insecure' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: Other(StringError("[src/pd/client.rs:67]: endpoints are invalid"))', src/libcore/result.rs:1009:5

note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace.
stack backtrace:

   0: std::sys::unix::backtrace::tracing::imp::unwind_backtrace

             at src/libstd/sys/unix/backtrace/tracing/gcc_s.rs:49

             at /rustc/14997d56a550f4aa99fe737593cd2758227afc56/src/libcore/macros.rs:26

   9: <core::result::Result<T, E>>::unwrap

             at /rustc/14997d56a550f4aa99fe737593cd2758227afc56/src/libcore/result.rs:808

  10: integrations::pd::test_rpc_client::new_client

             at tests/integrations/pd/test_rpc_client.rs:45

  11: integrations::pd::test_rpc_client::restart_leader

             at tests/integrations/pd/test_rpc_client.rs:272

  12: integrations::pd::test_rpc_client::test_restart_leader_insecure

             at tests/integrations/pd/test_rpc_client.rs:311

  13: integrations::pd::test_rpc_client::test_restart_leader_insecure::{{closure}}

             at tests/integrations/pd/test_rpc_client.rs:309

  14: core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once

             at /rustc/14997d56a550f4aa99fe737593cd2758227afc56/src/libcore/ops/function.rs:238

  15: <F as alloc::boxed::FnBox<A>>::call_box

             at src/libtest/lib.rs:1471

             at /rustc/14997d56a550f4aa99fe737593cd2758227afc56/src/libcore/ops/function.rs:238

             at /rustc/14997d56a550f4aa99fe737593cd2758227afc56/src/liballoc/boxed.rs:673

  16: __rust_maybe_catch_panic

             at src/libpanic_unwind/lib.rs:102

FAILED
```
